factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

properties.description: pipeline de carga rcc txt a synapse analytics

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	codFecha as string ("202001")
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("rcciden_"+$codFecha+".txt")]) ~> RccIdenTxt
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("rccslds_"+$codFecha+".txt")]) ~> RccSldsTxt
RccIdenTxt derive(fec_carga = currentTimestamp()) ~> Transform01
RccSldsTxt derive(fec_carga = currentTimestamp()) ~> Transform02
Transform01 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		COD_SBS as string,
		FECHA1 as string,
		TIPO_RUC as integer,
		RUC as string,
		TIPO_DOC as string,
		DOCUMENTO as string,
		TIP_PERSONA as integer,
		TIPO_EMPRESA as string,
		CANT_EMP as string,
		CAL_0 as decimal(18,2),
		CAL_1 as decimal(18,2),
		CAL_2 as decimal(18,2),
		CAL_3 as decimal(18,2),
		CAL_4 as decimal(18,2),
		APE_PATERNO as string,
		APE_MATERNO as string,
		APE_CASADA as string,
		PR_NOMBRE as string,
		SG_NOMBRE as string,
		FECHA as timestamp,
		CODMES as string,
		FECHA_CARGA as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	preSQLs:[("delete from rcc_iden where codmes = '" +$codFecha + "'")],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		COD_SBS = Column_1,
		FECHA1 = Column_2,
		TIPO_RUC = Column_3,
		RUC = Column_4,
		TIPO_DOC = Column_5,
		DOCUMENTO = Column_6,
		TIP_PERSONA = Column_7,
		TIPO_EMPRESA = Column_8,
		CANT_EMP = Column_9,
		CAL_0 = Column_10,
		CAL_1 = Column_11,
		CAL_2 = Column_12,
		CAL_3 = Column_13,
		CAL_4 = Column_14,
		APE_PATERNO = Column_15,
		APE_MATERNO = Column_16,
		APE_CASADA = Column_17,
		PR_NOMBRE = Column_18,
		SG_NOMBRE = Column_19,
		FECHA = Column_20,
		CODMES = Column_21,
		FECHA_CARGA = fec_carga
	)) ~> Dwh01RccIden
Transform02 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		C_TR as string,
		C_COD_SBS as string,
		C_COD_EMP as string,
		C_TC as string,
		C_CTA_CBLE as string,
		C_COND_DIAR as integer,
		C_SALDO as decimal(22,6),
		C_CLASIF as string,
		FECHA as string,
		CODMES as string,
		FECHA_CARGA as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	preSQLs:[("delete from RCC_SALDOS where codmes = '" +$codFecha + "'")],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		C_TR = Column_1,
		C_COD_SBS = Column_2,
		C_COD_EMP = Column_3,
		C_TC = Column_4,
		C_CTA_CBLE = Column_5,
		C_COND_DIAR = Column_6,
		C_SALDO = Column_7,
		C_CLASIF = Column_8,
		FECHA = Column_9,
		CODMES = Column_10,
		FECHA_CARGA = fec_carga
	)) ~> Dwh01RccSlds
